controller

Class CanvasController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.CanvasController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHighLevelController

    public class CanvasController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IHighLevelController
    Layer between UI and the domain Interprets UIEvents and passes these on to the appropriate interactionController.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CanvasController()
      constructs a new empty canvascontroller initialises activeInteractionController and the list of interactionControllers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addInteractionController(InteractionController interactionController)
      adds the param to the list of interactionControllers if it doesn't contain it already
      void changeActiveInteractionController(InteractionController interactionController)
      changes the active interactionController to the param
      InteractionController findHighestLevelInteractionController() 
      InteractionController getActiveInteractionController() 
      InteractionController getAppropriateInteractionController(java.awt.geom.Point2D clickedLocation) 
      java.util.List<InteractionController> getInteractionControllers() 
      void handleKeyEvent(KeyEvent keyEvent)
      handles a key event | if CTRLD if the activeInteractionController exists, let it handle the keyEvent | if CTRLN create a new interactionController and let it handle the keyEvent | else if the activeInteractionController exists let it handle the keyEvent
      void handleMouseEvent(MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      handles MouseEvent that affects the diagramSubwindow | if the activeInteractionController exists and it's dragging the activeInteractionController handles the mouseEvent | else if there is a clicked interactionController change it to active and let it handle the mouseEvent
      void removeInteractionController(InteractionController interactionController)
      removes the param of the list of interactionControllers if the interactionController was active, set the interactionController with the highest level as active
      void setActiveInteractionController(InteractionController activeInteractionController)
      sets activeInteractionController to the given param
      void setInteractionControllers(java.util.List<InteractionController> interactionControllers)
      sets the list of interactionControllers to the given param
      java.util.List<Subwindow> sortDiagramSubwindows()
      method that gathers and sorts all the Subwindows

        public void handleKeyEvent(KeyEvent keyEvent)

                           UIException
